trans-unit.source: The source of the event, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento, o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted" />, and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted" /> events of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará os eventos <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle com um objeto comercial e um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle para excluir dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> inicialmente exibe um conjunto de todos os funcionários, usando o método especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> propriedade para recuperar os dados do `EmployeeLogic` objeto.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically displays a **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> está definida como `true`, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controlar automaticamente exibe um **excluir** botão.

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Delete** button, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> action is performed using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property and any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se você clicar no **excluir** botão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> ação é executada usando o método especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> propriedade e os parâmetros que são especificados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo de código, algumas etapas de pós-processamento e pré-processamento também são executadas.

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> action has completed, to perform exception handling.
trans-unit.target: O `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegado é chamado para manipular a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> evento antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> ação é executada e o `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegado é chamado para manipular a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> evento após o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> ação for concluída, para executar tratamento de exceção.

trans-unit.source: In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, se um `NorthwindDataException` é gerada, ela será manipulada por este delegado.

trans-unit.source: To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para examinar a implementação de `EmployeeLogic` objeto comercial de camada intermediária que usa este exemplo de código, consulte a visão geral da classe no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>.
